text:
A Tense Encounter

<setup: dark entryway, old woman, young man, suspenseful>
<speaker>: *That bellâ€¦ it feels familiar.*  
<speaker>: *Nerves are shot. Focus.*  

---

<setup: old woman, distrustful gaze, dim light>
<speaker>: *Step in, my good sir.*  
<speaker>: *Raskolnikov, a student. I came here a month ago.*  
<speaker>: *I remember, quite well.*

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov visits an old woman in a dark entry, feeling increasingly anxious and mistrusted.
